quotes.text: You’ve made it this far. Keep up the great work!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Every day, in every way, you’re getting better and better.
quotes.author: Émile Coué

quotes.text: Celebrate your progress, no matter how small.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.text: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh

quotes.text: Your hard work is paying off. Keep going!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: You are capable of amazing things.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Your efforts are appreciated. Keep shining!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Life is not about waiting for the storm to pass but about learning to dance in the rain.
quotes.author: Vivian Greene

quotes.text: Do not be discouraged by your failures. Learn from them and keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: The only way out is through.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: It’s not whether you get knocked down; it’s whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: It’s never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.text: Courage doesn’t always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, ‘I will try again tomorrow.’
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.text: When you feel like quitting, think about why you started.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: You are stronger than you know. Never underestimate your power to heal and grow.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: The struggle you’re in today is developing the strength you need for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.text: When everything seems to be going wrong, remember that airplanes take off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: It’s okay to be a glowstick: sometimes we need to break before we shine.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.text: There is no despair so absolute as that which comes with the first moments of our first great sorrow, when we have not yet known what it is to have suffered and be healed, to have despaired and have recovered hope.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.text: Healing takes courage, and we all have courage, even if we have to dig a little to find it.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.text: The human capacity for burden is like bamboo—far more flexible than you’d ever believe at first glance.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.text: The bravest thing I ever did was continuing my life when I wanted to die.
quotes.author: Juliette Lewis

quotes.text: Just when the caterpillar thought the world was over, it became a butterfly.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou
